text: 19:9 Aposel 9:2; 2 Korin 6:14-18; 2 Pita 2:2Ezɨ marazir naviba gavgavizɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Polɨn akabar ikian aghuagha, gumazamizibar damazibar azenara mɨgɨrɨgɨar kurabar Godɨn Tuavim gami. Ezɨ Pol me ategha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn itir darazi inigha ghu. Egha dughiabar zurara Tiranusɨn suren dɨpenimɨn bizibar me mɨgei.
